Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the system design documentation from yesterday.
Begin implementing the movement system. Create the necessary classes and data structures in the game engine. Focus on basic walking and running movement.
Implement jumping and crouching. Integrate these movement types with the existing walking and running code. Ensure smooth transitions between states.
Test the implemented movement system. Debug any issues related to movement speed, animation transitions, or input responsiveness.
Begin implementing the combat system. Create the necessary classes and data structures to represent attacks and damage. Focus on a basic melee attack.
Implement hit detection. Create a system for detecting collisions between attacks and enemy characters. Calculate damage based on weapon type and enemy armor (if applicable).
Test the implemented combat system. Debug any issues related to hit detection, damage calculation, or animation synchronization.
Document the implemented movement and combat systems. Update the system design documentation to reflect the actual implementation. Include code snippets and examples.
